changelogs.short_description: Add support for linux/arm64 Docker image (M1 Mac compatible)
changelogs.long_description:
Hasura Enterprise Edition Data Plane images are now M1 Mac compatible. The list of compatible images is as follows:

- hasura/graphql-engine-pro:v2.9.0-pro.1
- hasura/graphql-engine-pro:v2.9.0-pro.1.cli-migrations-v2
- hasura/graphql-engine-pro:v2.9.0-pro.1.cli-migrations-v3
